description: Cyclone Montha is intensifying in the Bay of Bengal, prompting coastal states of Andhra Pradesh and Odisha to prepare for landfall by late Tuesday. Authorities are evacuating vulnerable populations, closing schools, and issuing advisories as gale-force winds of 90-110 kmph are anticipated. Eight Odisha districts have been designated 'red zones' expecting severe impact.

description: Five government schoolteachers in Rajasthan were suspended for allegedly selling milk powder meant for mid-day meals to sweet manufacturers. A high-level committee is investigating the incident, with a report due in four days. The education department is implementing stricter checks on food stock and distribution to prevent future misuse.

title: Shashi Tharoor reviews Aryan Khan’s The Ba***ds of Bollywood

Struggling with a cold and cough, Tharoor revealed that he had cancelled his engagements for two days. Persuaded by his staff and sister Smita Tharoor, he decided to turn his attention to the series and was instantly hooked.

The families are reportedly planning further legal action to ensure the implementation of the repatriation order.

Skattebo was carted off the field after his leg twisted awkwardly. The team awaits an official diagnosis, but the injury appears significant. This setback adds to the Giants' ongoing offensive challenges.

His decade-long career with the Jets was marked by exceptional leadership and toughness, leaving a significant legacy.

Jude Bellingham netted the winner, building on Kylian Mbappé's opener, as Xabi Alonso's men overcame Barcelona's possession dominance. As Barcelona battled the challenges with key absences, Madrid showcased their resilience and clinical finishing to secure a crucial win.

'No communication': Rahane's strong message to selectors
description: Ajinkya Rahane expressed his readiness for India's Australia tour, lamenting a lack of communication regarding his selection. He emphasized that experience and passion for red-ball cricket are more important than age, citing seasoned players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli. Rahane also advised young talent Sarfaraz Khan to focus on scoring runs and controlling what he can.

title: Flying into the US? You will be photographed; entered into facial recognition database
description: US Customs and Border Protection will expand its biometric tracking, photographing nearly all non-US citizens entering or departing the country. This new rule, effective soon, aims to enhance national security and combat fraudulent travel by creating a comprehensive facial-recognition database.  It eliminates previous age exemptions and applies to all non-citizens, including lawful permanent residents.

Toria Aronoff Schottenstein honors stepbrother Ben Bader after tragic death
description: Popular American YouTuber and motivational creator Ben Bader has died in a sudden accident, reportedly a freak sauna incident. His stepsister confirmed his passing, remembering him as a kind soul who inspired thousands with his messages of hope and purpose. Bader's digital legacy, known as "The Ben Effect," continues to impact fans worldwide.

description: Rohit Sharma credits a rare extended break for his stellar performance in the recent ODI series against Australia. This period allowed him to mentally and physically prepare, focusing on his career's future. His century in the final ODI, alongside Virat Kohli, showcased the blend of experience and mentorship crucial for the Indian team.

‘Drunk drivers are terrorists’: Hyderabad top cop on Kurnool bus fire
description: Hyderabad Police Commissioner VC Sajjanar declared drunk drivers as terrorists following a tragic bus fire that killed 20 people in Kurnool. He emphasized that the incident, caused by an intoxicated biker, was a preventable massacre, not an accident. Sajjanar vowed a zero-tolerance approach to drunk driving in Hyderabad, stating such acts will be punished as crimes.

GM layoffs: Engineers fired on Microsoft Teams; Says it's business, not you
description: General Motors has let go of over 200 salaried employees, mainly CAD engineers, at its Michigan tech campus. This move, part of a restructuring to boost profits, follows strong third-quarter earnings and a raised financial outlook. GM stated the layoffs target execution roles to enhance core design capabilities. This comes as the automotive sector sees broader workforce reductions.

title: Screams, smoke, shattered glass: Horrific memories of Kurnool bus fire haunt survivors
description: Survivors of the Kurnool bus fire recount fragmented horrors of screams, smoke, and a desperate fight for life, haunted by those they couldn't save.  Meanwhile, devastated families await DNA results to claim the bodies of the 19 deceased, with postmortem and sample collection completed at the accident site.

title: 'Greed for power': Tejashwi counters Chirag's 'no Muslim CM' charge; questions his 'vision'
description: Tejashwi Yadav accused Chirag Paswan of power greed, claiming he compromised his political stand by joining the ruling alliance. Yadav's remarks followed Paswan's accusation that the RJD opposed a Muslim chief minister in 2005 and continues to do so, urging minority communities to reconsider their loyalty.

title: ‘Rape charges, marriage proposal’: Fresh revelations in Maha doctor suicide; probe takes a twist
description: A 28-year-old doctor's suicide in Satara has taken a disturbing turn with allegations of rape by a police sub-inspector and a techie.  The deceased, from Beed, left a note on her palm implicating the sub-inspector and another individual for five months of torment. Authorities have apprehended both accused in connection with the alleged rape and abetment of suicide.

title: GitHub is in trouble from AI; Gates complained, Nadella agrees
description: Microsoft is revamping GitHub to tackle AI coding rivals like Cursor and Claude Code. CEO Satya Nadella highlighted the need to unify development tools, drawing parallels to Bill Gates' past vision.  The platform aims to integrate AI across all developer workflows, ensuring choice in models and surfaces to regain developer mindshare.

title: Hailee Steinfeld reveals 11pm emergency therapy call while Josh Allen faces Bills' slump
description: Actress Hailee Steinfeld candidly shared her struggles with career and relationship pressures, detailing a late-night therapy session prompted by doubts about balancing ambitions. Her personal newsletter, Beau Society, now on Substack, offers fans intimate insights. Meanwhile, her husband, NFL star Josh Allen, aims to lead the Buffalo Bills back to winning ways amidst their own public scrutiny.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle is transforming Edmonton’s design culture
description: While the Oilers faced a Stanley Cup Final loss, Lauren Kyle McDavid is forging her own path in Edmonton. Her innovative Trove Living concept, blending furniture, design, and a social hub, has become a vibrant downtown destination.  Her fashion brand and community involvement further solidify her commitment to the city, mirroring Connor's ambition.
